name: meta-templatescript
title: TemplateScript
description: JavaScript which adds a menu of configurable templates and scripts to the sidebar. It automatically handles templates for various forms (from editing to protection), edit summaries, auto-submission, and filtering which templates are shown based on namespace, form, or arbitrary conditions. Templates can be inserted at the cursor position or at a preconfigured position, and scripts can be invoked when a sidebar link is activated. TemplateScript is also used as a framework for other scripts, and includes a fully-featured regex editor.
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-forceltr
title: ForceLTR
description: JavaScript which enforces left-to-right layout and editing on right-to-left wikis. This resolves editing glitches in many browsers when one's preferred language is left-to-right, and corrects display when the interface language is not right-to-left.
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-stewardscript
title: StewardScript
description: JavaScript which extends the user interface for Wikimedia stewards' convenience.
author: Pathoschild

name: meta-usejs
title: UseJS
description: JavaScript which imports JavaScript for the current page when the URL contains a parameter like &usejs=MediaWiki:Common.js. It only accepts scripts in the protected MediaWiki: namespace.
author: Pathoschild
